Scooby-Doo!.name: Villain Disguises
Scooby-Doo!.description: Gives all major level bosses a disguise.

The Simpsons.name: All Hail King Homer
The Simpsons.description: Character turns gold and can detect gold bricks.

Back to the Future.name: Faulty Flux Drive
Back to the Future.description: Vehicles get Back To The Future effects.

Doctor Who.name: Sound of the Doctor
Doctor Who.description: Replace all music with Doctor Who theme tracks.

The Wizard of Oz.name: We're Off to See the Wizard

Ghostbusters.name: Boosted Busting
Ghostbusters.description: Catching ghosts is easier and awards more studs.

Mission: Impossible.name: Fall Rescue
Mission: Impossible.description: Saves you if you fall off edges.

The A-Team.name: I Know a Guy
The A-Team.description: Tag items upgrades cost half as many studs.

Adventure Time.name: Mathematical!
Adventure Time.description: Extra stud bonus multipliers during combat combos.

Harry Potter.name: Accio Studs!
Harry Potter.description: Magically draws nearby studs towards you.

E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.name: Flower Power!
E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.description: Flowers sprout from the ground where you walk.

Gremlins.name: Destruction!
Gremlins.description: Objects are destroyed upon walking into them. One hit defeats two standard enemies.

Fantastic Beasts.name: Wizarding Whizz!
Fantastic Beasts.description: Magic interactions are faster and reward more studs.

The LEGO Batman Movie.name: Always Batman
The LEGO Batman Movie.description: Play as LEGO Batman in any franchise by putting the normal Batman Tag on the Toy Pad.

Knight Rider.name: K.I.T.T. My Ride
Knight Rider.description: All vehicles play the Knight Rider theme and talk like K.I.T.T.

LEGO City.name: Stud Chest Master
LEGO City.description: Makes stud chest cycles much slower.

Teen Titans Go!.name: Hire-a-Hero Discount
Teen Titans Go!.description: Reduce the stud cost of Hire-a-Hero.

The Powerpuff Girls.name: Big Head Mode
The Powerpuff Girls.description: Makes party characters heads turn big.

Beetlejuice.name: Tiny Head Mode
Beetlejuice.description: Makes party characters heads turn tiny.
